title: Preloader minimum display and fade out behavior
description: Verify that the preloader black screen with logo is displayed for at least 1.4 seconds and fades out only after the hero content is fully loaded.

steps.description: Load the webinar landing page
Check that the preloader screen with logo is visible immediately on load
Verify that the preloader stays visible for at least 1.4 seconds
Confirm that preloader only fades out after all hero content including images are fully loaded
Validate that after fade out, the hero section is visible and interactive

title: Hero section scroll-driven image sequence animation
description: Validate that the scroll-driven canvas image sequence animates smoothly and the images are rendered in the correct order as user scrolls.

steps.description: Load the landing page and wait for preloader to disappear
Confirm hero image sequence starts with first image correctly rendered
Scroll down slowly through the hero section
Verify that hero images update sequentially with scroll position without jank or frame drops
Confirm images are displayed in correct order as per API sequence URLs
Scroll back up and verify reverse image sequence animation correctness

title: Hero 'Reserve my seat' CTA opens registration modal
description: Check that clicking the 'Reserve my seat' button in the hero section opens the registration modal reliably.

steps.description: Load the page and wait for preloader fade out
Click on the hero's 'Reserve my seat' CTA button
Verify that the registration modal is displayed
Check mandatory form fields (name, email, phone) are present and empty initially

title: Header sticky behavior and CTA functionality
description: Confirm that the sticky header remains visible and functional during page scroll and its 'Reserve my seat' CTA opens the registration modal.

steps.description: Load the page and scroll down partially
Verify the header remains sticky and visible at top of viewport
Click on the 'Reserve my seat' button in the header
Confirm that the registration modal opens

title: Scroll to details CTA smooth scrolling
description: Check that clicking the 'Scroll to know more' CTA in the hero smoothly scrolls the page to the informative sections.

steps.description: Load the page
Click the 'Scroll to know more' CTA in the hero section
Verify that the page scrolls smoothly to the detailed informational sections
Confirm that scrolling behavior uses Lenis smooth scroll without jank

title: Registration modal form field validation
description: Validate client-side form validation for registration modal fields: name (non-empty), email (proper format), phone (numerical and length).

steps.description: Open the registration modal
Submit the form with all fields empty
Verify required field validation messages appear for all fields
Enter invalid email format in email field and valid input for others
Submit the form
Confirm email format validation error is displayed
Enter phone with alphabets or less than required digits and valid input for others
Submit the form
Verify phone field validation error is shown

title: Successful registration submission flow
description: Test that submitting valid registration data results in successful submission to backend API, modal displays success message and clears form fields.

steps.description: Open the registration modal
Fill form with valid name, valid email, valid phone number
Submit the registration form
Verify a success message or thank-you message is displayed in the modal
Confirm form inputs are cleared or modal resets appropriately after success

title: Registration submission error handling
description: Verify that if the backend API returns error or is unreachable, an error message is shown in the registration modal.

steps.description: Open registration modal
Fill form with valid data
Simulate backend API failure or return an error response
Submit the registration form
Check that a descriptive error message is displayed within the modal
Ensure that the form remains with user data for correction or retry

title: Registration backend API request validation and data appending
description: Test that the backend API POST /api/register validates incoming data fields properly and appends valid data to Google Sheets.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/register with missing fields
API returns validation error with appropriate HTTP status code
Send POST request with malformed email or phone
API returns validation error argument details
Send POST request with valid registration data
API responds with success status
Verify that the registration data is appended correctly to Google Sheets

title: Hero image sequence URLs API correctness
description: Validate that GET /api/sequence endpoint returns a correctly ordered list of hero image URLs from the public folder.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/sequence
Verify the response status is success
Check that the response contains an array of URLs
Confirm URLs are sorted in the intended order for animation sequence
Verify the URLs point to existing images accessible publicly

title: Image preloader hook image loading and progress tracking
description: Test the custom image preloader hook handles concurrent loading of hero images, reports accurate progress, and triggers early-ready state appropriately.

steps.description: Initialize image preloader with hero image URLs
Verify multiple images are loaded concurrently for efficiency
Check progress updates correspond correctly to images loaded vs total
Simulate delayed image load for some images
Confirm early-ready state triggers when threshold number of images are loaded prior to full completion

title: Responsive layout across device types
description: Ensure the landing page layout including hero, informational sections, sticky header, registration modal, and footer adapt correctly for desktop, tablet, and mobile viewport sizes.

steps.description: Load landing page on desktop viewport
Verify all sections are visible, content is readable, and styling is consistent
Resize or emulate tablet viewport
Validate responsive adjustments are correct with no layout breakage
Resize or emulate mobile viewport
Confirm content stack, font size, button sizes are optimized for mobile usability
Open registration modal on each viewport
Check modal form fields and buttons are usable and not clipped at all viewport sizes

title: Sticky footer branding and external links correctness
description: Verify that the footer displays correct branding, includes all relevant external resource links, and links are functional.

steps.description: Load landing page
Verify footer is visible at page bottom
Confirm branding elements (logo, text) are displayed as specified
Check presence of each external link described in PRD
Click each external link to verify URL opens correctly in a new tab or as specified

title: Verify accessibility of registration modal and form
description: Confirm the registration modal supports keyboard navigation, focus is managed properly, and form fields have accessible labels.

steps.description: Open registration modal
Use keyboard (Tab key) to navigate through modal elements
Ensure focus cycles through all interactive form fields and buttons in logical order
Check each form input has associated accessible labels
Press Escape key while modal is open
Verify modal closes and focus returns to element that triggered modal opening

title: Scroll behavior with Lenis smooth scrolling
description: Validate that all scroll interactions including page scroll, jump to sections from CTAs, and back to top behave smoothly using Lenis without jank.

steps.description: Load page and scroll manually via mouse wheel or touchpad
Verify scrolling is smooth with no abrupt jumps or jank
Click 'Scroll to know more' CTA and observe scrolling behavior
Confirm scroll animation is smooth and targets correct section
Use header navigation or other UI that triggers scroll jumps
Validate smooth and predictable scroll transitions
